data.eml:eml: Lathriobates manohardasi sp. nov. (Hemiptera: Gerromorpha: Gerridae) from Tamil Nadu, India, with a key to the species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chandra, Kailash, Jehamalar, Eyarin (2012): Lathriobates manohardasi sp. nov. (Hemiptera: Gerromorpha: Gerridae) from Tamil Nadu, India, with a key to the species. Zootaxa 3186: 64-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211554
